title: Witness to war
creator_credit: Skylight Pictures, American Friends Service Committee, David Goodman and Deborah Shaffer
brief_description: A dramatic story of Dr. Charlie Clements’ journey from pilot in Vietnam to pacifist doctor behind rebel lines in El Salvador. (Awards: 1986 Academy Award - Best Short Documentary)
